\subsection{Constructor \& Destructor Documentation}
\hypertarget{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task_ad0c18c7b0fc306cf4fe6f133766b2779}{\index{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task@{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task}!Task@{Task}}
\index{Task@{Task}!sigma::core::tasks::Task@{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task}}
\subsubsection[{Task}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task\-::\-Task (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{{\bf Task} $\ast$}]{parent, }
\item[{const chaos\-::uni\-::\-U\-T\-F8\-String \&}]{title}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task_ad0c18c7b0fc306cf4fe6f133766b2779}


Constructs a new \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} object. 

Tasks must be provided with a non-\/null parent task and a title. Constructing a task will assign a globally unique id to the task.


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em parent} & The \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} this will be a child of. \\
\hline
{\em title} & The title of the task.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}

\begin{DoxyExceptions}{Exceptions}
{\em chaos\-::ex\-::\-Value\-Error} & If the {\ttfamily parent} parameter is null, or the {\ttfamily title} parameter is empty. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyExceptions}
\hypertarget{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task_a222255707537a07f64c687c87efef1e6}{\index{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task@{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task}!Task@{Task}}
\index{Task@{Task}!sigma::core::tasks::Task@{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task}}
\subsubsection[{Task}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task\-::\-Task (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{const {\bf Task} \&}]{other}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task_a222255707537a07f64c687c87efef1e6}


Copy constructor. 

Creates a new \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} by copying values from the other given \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}. A \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_root_task}{Root\-Task} cannot be copied from.

\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
This task will be assigned a new id rather than having its id copied from the given task. Likewise this task will be initialised with no children as they will not be copied from the other \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}.
\end{DoxyNote}

\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em other} & \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} to copy from.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}

\begin{DoxyExceptions}{Exceptions}
{\em chaos\-::ex\-::\-Value\-Error} & If the {\ttfamily other} parameter is a \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_root_task}{Root\-Task}. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyExceptions}
\hypertarget{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task_a22316f108f9eeea2d2497b825b068c84}{\index{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task@{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task}!Task@{Task}}

)\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [protected]}}}\label{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task_a22316f108f9eeea2d2497b825b068c84}


Root Constructor. 

Protected constructor which should only be used by Root\-Tasks. This creates a \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} which has a null parent.


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em title} & The title of the task. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}

Returns the parent \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} of this \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}. 

All Tasks have parent Tasks apart from a \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_root_task}{Root\-Task}. \hypertarget{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task_a975655055e70f4a2228153e84ff4e725}{\index{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task@{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task}!set\-\_\-parent@{set\-\_\-parent}}

Sets the parent \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} of this \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}.

Reimplemented in \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_root_task_a4b9f9c86ba7a0e5b681479a444cd60b1}{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Root\-Task}.

\hypertarget{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task_abac88c4ddaf54ae20aab497e95023f9e}{\index{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task@{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task}!add\-\_\-child@{add\-\_\-child}}
\index{add\-\_\-child@{add\-\_\-child}!sigma::core::tasks::Task@{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task}}
\subsubsection[{add\-\_\-child}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}bool sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task\-::add\-\_\-child (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{{\bf Task} $\ast$const}]{child}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task_abac88c4ddaf54ae20aab497e95023f9e}


Makes this the parent \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} of the given \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}. 

This will both update the parent attribute of the child \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} and the children attribute of this \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}.

\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
If the given \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} is already a child of this \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} this function will do nothing.
\end{DoxyNote}
\begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
Tasks that are above this \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} in the hierarchy cannot be added as child Tasks.
\end{DoxyWarning}

\begin{DoxyExceptions}{Exceptions}
{\em chaos\-::ex\-::\-Illegal\-Action\-Error} & If the \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} to add as a child is above this \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} in the hierarchy (i.\-e. it's a parent, grand-\/parent, etc).\\
\hline
\end{DoxyExceptions}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
Whether this function has made any changes. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
\hypertarget{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task_a9df7e8a262b51b440cc6a45dbe219810}{\index{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task@{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task}!remove\-\_\-child@{remove\-\_\-child}}
\index{remove\-\_\-child@{remove\-\_\-child}!sigma::core::tasks::Task@{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task}}
\subsubsection[{remove\-\_\-child}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}bool sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task\-::remove\-\_\-child (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{{\bf Task} $\ast$const}]{child}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task_a9df7e8a262b51b440cc6a45dbe219810}


Unparents the given \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} from this \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}. 

If the given \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} is a child of this \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} then it will be removed from this \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}'s list of children. If the given \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} is not a child of this \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} this function will have no effect.

\begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
Removing a child will result in the deletion of the child \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} as it becomes unparented which qualifies for deletion.
\end{DoxyWarning}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
Whether this function has made any changes. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
\hypertarget{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task_acb08acc571c5e0678d27d52a18a7db5e}{\index{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task@{sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task}!clear\-\_\-children@{clear\-\_\-children}}

\subsubsection[{clear\-\_\-children}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}void sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task\-::clear\-\_\-children (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
{}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task_acb08acc571c5e0678d27d52a18a7db5e}


Unparents all child Tasks of this \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}. 

This function will result in this \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} having no children.

\begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
The child Tasks will be deleted by this function since the Tasks become unparented which qualifies for deletion. 
\end{DoxyWarning}

Relevant callback functions take one argument\-:
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item {\ttfamily Task$\ast$} -\/ the \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} that has just been created.

\end{DoxyParamCaption}

For registering callbacks that handle when a \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} is destroyed. 

Relevant callback functions take one argument\-:
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item {\ttfamily Task$\ast$} -\/ the \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} that is about to be destroyed.
\end{DoxyItemize}

\begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
Exceptions should be avoided in registered callback functions since these functions will be called from within a \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}'s destructor. 
\end{DoxyWarning}

\subsubsection[{on\-\_\-parent\-\_\-changed}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}{\bf sigma\-::core\-::\-Callback\-Interface}$<${\bf Task}$\ast$, {\bf Task}$\ast$, {\bf Task}$\ast$$>$$\ast$ sigma\-::core\-::tasks\-::\-Task\-::on\-\_\-parent\-\_\-changed (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
{}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}}}\label{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task_a4947e26b1208f36cf4bab3f2091db786}


For registering callbacks that handle when a \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} has its parent attribute changed. 

Relevant callback functions take three arguments\-:
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item {\ttfamily Task$\ast$} -\/ The \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} thats parent has changed.
\item {\ttfamily Task$\ast$} -\/ The previous parent of the \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}.
\item {\ttfamily Task$\ast$} -\/ The new parent of the \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task}.
\end{DoxyItemize}

\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
If the new parent is null this \hyperlink{classsigma_1_1core_1_1tasks_1_1_task}{Task} is about to be destroyed. 
\end{DoxyNote}
